title: Publish npm packages (@moe/daemon, @moe/proxy)
description:
Prepare and publish npm packages for easy installation.

**Packages:**
- @anthropic/moe-daemon (or @moe/daemon if available)
- @anthropic/moe-proxy

**Required:**
- Package.json metadata (description, keywords, repository, bugs, homepage)
- Proper exports and type definitions
- Bin entries for CLI commands
- Peer dependencies documented
- npm publish workflow
- Scoped package or unique name
taskRails: Use npm provenance for supply chain security
